mainText:
Tuning in to Apple product launches has become a regular activity for me in recent years. I would look forward to them like a kid on Christmas morning. Even though I may not have been able to purchase the item on the day it was released or even shortly thereafter -  I could dream. 



My family and I are the proud owners of IPads, the ITouch and multiple IPods. I have a 4 year old who proudly knows how to use his daddy's IPad and our next laptop will be a Mac. None of this would have occurred without the leadership and vision of Steve Jobs! Thanks Steve and thanks to your family for sharing you with us all these years.
author: Patricia
